thread.title: BridgeStreet Global Hospitality Announces Exclusive Partnership with Kettler Managed Property
thread.title_full: BridgeStreet Global Hospitality Announces Exclusive Partnership with Kettler Managed Property - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: BridgeStreet Global Hospitality Announces Exclusive Partnership with Kettler Managed Property
text:
BridgeStreet Global Hospitality
Serviced Apartment Leader Brings Experiences to VITA at Tysons Corner Center
RESTON, Va. , Sept. 1, BridgeStreet Global Hospitality – the leading hospitality solution offering serviced apartment experiences – announces today an exclusive deal with Kettler Management, adding 34 units in Tysons, VA. With this partnership, BridgeStreet will be the only provider offering serviced apartments experiences in VITA at Tysons Corner Center. Guests will have access to the exciting, modern mixed-use development that boasts retail, dining and offices within a walkable, social community.
"Kettler Management has had a longstanding relationship with BridgeStreet," said Cindy Clare , President of Kettler Management. "We're happy to continue that relationship by forging a partnership at VITA Tysons Corner Center. Our staff graciously welcomes BridgeStreets' guests, and we hope they enjoy the unmatched features and amenities VITA has to offer."
Washington, DC is an international hub of business, industry and politics and BridgeStreet's exclusive deal with Kettler delivers the very best in city-living to their guests-no matter their length of stay. The new units are a part of the 30-story luxury apartment tower in Tyson's Corner Center in northern Virginia , just outside Washington DC and connect directly to the metro line by covered walkway. Amenity-rich and distinctly metropolitan, VITA is a great fit for BridgeStreet serviced apartments and the discerning travelers who rely on BridgeStreet's uncompromising brand standards.
"It was important to BridgeStreet to have this exclusive partnership with Kettler for VITA," said Derrick LaRosa , Director of Real Estate for BridgeStreet. "This is a strategic move into a ultra-modern and well-located luxury tower that gives BridgeStreet guests access not only to luxury amenities within the VITA building, but also to the food, shopping and businesses that make Tysons Corner Center such a desirable and dynamic destination."
With its innovative tiered system of six distinct brands, BridgeStreet provides guests with customized six- to two-star serviced apartment offerings, meeting every need from location to budget with more than 50,000 apartments in desirable and convenient locations in over 60 countries. Offering a memorable hospitality experience, BridgeStreet is widely recognized for uncompromised standards and a consistent brand experience.
For more information on Exclusive by BridgeStreet at VITA Tysons Corner Center, visit www.bridgestreet.com or call 1(800) 278-7338 / +44 (0) 20 7792 2222 .
About BridgeStreet Global Hospitality
With more than 50,000 apartments in over 60 countries, BridgeStreet Global Hospitality – comprised of six unique brands – is the leading hospitality solution offering serviced apartment experiences for travelers seeking an alternative to typical hotel accommodations. BridgeStreet's family of brands includes six-star Exclusive, five-star Residences, four-star ApartHotels and Living, three-star Places and two-star Studyo offering the convenience of apartment living with a variety of service packages to offer each guest options based on location, price point and individual needs. Widely recognized for uncompromising standards of quality, comfort and service, BridgeStreet Global Hospitality is a renowned award winner in both the Americas and EMEA ( Europe , the Middle East and Africa ). For more information on BridgeStreet Global Hospitality, please visit www.bridgestreet.com or call 800 278 7338.
